DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether high-risk kidney transplant patient ( patient whose previous kidney transplant fail , high PRA lab test result African-American descent ) combination Rapamune Prograf steroid prevent acute rejection well Rapamune cyclosporine steroid .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Sirolimus/Prograf v Sirolimus/CsA High-Risk Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients AfricanAmerican descent patient history multiple transplant and/or patient high panel reactive antibody lab test renal transplant cadaveric donor , live unrelated donor livingrelated mismatched donor . Age > = 13 year , weight > = 40 kg Women must negative pregnancy test study entry Exclusion criterion Multiple organ transplant double kidney transplant ( pediatric enbloc double adult ) Active systemic infection , localize major infection know HIV Patients residual kidney function > 20 mL/min
